review: The internet connection on this device constantly drops out and you have to either reboot the Fire Stick or wait for it to reconnect. It's not my wireless or Internet connection, because all my other devices don't suffer the same issue (including my Fire tablet in the same room as the Fire TV Stick). I got this so that I could transfer Prime movies from my Fire tablet to my TV and back in real time - so I could keep watching even if I had to leave the room. This works maybe 60% of the time. The rest of the time I get connection errors between the Kindle and the Fire TV Stick and either have to wait for them to try to talk to each other or restart the video. Very annoying.If everything worked properly I would give this 5 stars. Unfortunately, it feels like the device just isn't quite ready for market. If future generations have an improved wireless device in them (or maybe it's a software upgrade that is needed) then this will be a nice enhancement to the Kindle Fire tablet experience.
author: S. Waletzko
